description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Historical Collections of the State of Pennsylvania; containing a copious selection of the most interesting facts ... relating to its history and antiquities ... with topographical descriptions of every county and all the larger towns in the state. Illustrated by 165 engravings" Author: DAY, Sherman. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1447.i.8." Page: 623 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1843 Publisher: George W. Gorton Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000884734 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Please note that you will need to enter details from the above list - such as the shelfmark, the page, the book's volume and so on - when filling out your order. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue. You will be able to download a PDF of the book this image is taken from, as well as view the pages up close with the 'itemViewer'.
